item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

[quote=“Rome11, post:5, topic:542975”]No, I’m not the owner. I’m the head Moderator. I just do all the advertising. Thomas is the Owner and Developer. We have 3 other coders, but Thomas does most of it.

Correction, I am the Co-Owner.[/quote]
You need to be the owner of the server in order to advertise it on MoparScape.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Rome11 Rome11
item.description:
@Rome11 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:11, topic:542975”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=661850.msg4423922#msg4423922 date=1399795493]

No idea who that is, so I will have to say no. I don’t think the Owner leeched this from anybody. Most of the coding was done by his hand. Are you joining us?

Sure it was. Is that why it looks exactly like a server that someone called Arham made?
[/quote]
No? It looks 100% different from my release. Don’t accuse anything to this server.[/quote]

Thanks for clearing things up… I’m sorry we happen to have the same name. I’m new to Mopar and I had no idea we had the same server name. If you want me to change the name of my server I will be happy to.

Read full topic
